skillDetailsWithMonstersList.skillDescription: Aura: Heal all allied Insects and Ancients by 7% of their own Max Health at the start of every turn. They start combat with Age.
Aura: All Insects and Warriors in the party receive 5% less damage and have a 15% reduced chance to receive Critical Hits.
Aura: All Insect Monsters in your party start combat with 8 Charge stacks.
Aura: Whenever an Insect or Construct Monster in the party applies a Buff or a Debuff, it gains a Charge stack.
